name: Taekwondo Demonstration Team Simulator
description:
The Taekwondo Demonstration Team Simulator brings you a new experience.
You can decorate the demonstration team by configuring the cool Taekwondo movements as a show stage.

In addition, you can see 14 types of official Taekwondo poomsae, and you can see the demonstration in 3D form.

Create and train your own demonstration team to win world competitions.
In the competition, you can enjoy it in VR.
